title: Arthur Locked in the Library!: An Arthur Chapter Book (Arthur Chapter Books)
features: After Arthur calls Francine a marshmallow, she refuses to speak to him. Then Mr. Ratburn pairs them up for a homework project. They reluctantly go to the library for research-and find themselves locked in once the library closes. Will Arthur and Francine set aside their differences and work together to find a way out? In chapter-book format, for children who are ready to read on their own, this supenseful adventure will surely be a hit among Arthur fans.
description: is the creator of the bestselling Arthur Adventure book series and creative producer of the number-one children's PBS television series, Arthur. He has also illustrated many other books for children, including
If All the Animals Came Inside, Ten Tiny Toes
. Marc lives with his family in Martha's Vineyard.
